meanings.definition: A type of Dutch cargo ship.
meanings.sent1: The fluyt sailed smoothly across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The merchants loaded their goods onto the fluyt for the journey.
meanings.sent3: The fluyt ship seemed to wink at the other vessels in the harbor.
meanings.sent4: The fluyt was a sturdy workhorse of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flag on the fluyt fluttered in the wind.

meanings.definition: To transport goods on a fluyt ship.
meanings.sent1: They fluyted the spices from the East Indies.
meanings.sent2: Merchants often fluyted their wares using these ships.
meanings.sent3: The captain joked that he could fluyt faster than anyone else.
meanings.sent4: She fluyted the cargo with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: Fluyting goods on a fluyt ship was a common practice in those days.

meanings.definition: The fluyt ship was used for trade.
meanings.sent1: Trade flourished thanks to the reliable fluyt.
meanings.sent2: The fluyt ship was a key player in the trading network.
meanings.sent3: The fluyt ship always had a full dance card with all the trading partners.
meanings.sent4: The fluyt ship cut through the waves like a sharp blade through butter.
meanings.sent5: The fluyt ship symbolized prosperity and commerce in those times.
